raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Compounds of the disclosure demonstrate an IC50 in a 15 to 60 minute recombinant human assay of preferably less than 10 μΜ, less than 5 μΜ, less than 2.5 μΜ, less than 1 μΜ. less than 750 nM, less than 500 nM, less than 250 nM, less than 100 nM, less than 50 nM, and most preferably less than 20 nM.
The IC50 ("Inhibitory Concentration - 50%") is a measure of the amount of compound required to achieve 50% inhibition of the kinase activity, over a specific time period, in a kinase activity assay. 
When tested in this assay, compounds of the disclosure had greater than 50% inhibitory activity at 10 μΜ concentration of the test compound, preferably greater than 60% inhibitory activity at 10 μΜ concentration of the test compound, more preferably greater than 70% inhibitory activity at 10 μΜ concentration of the test compound, and even more preferably greater than 80% inhibitory activity at 10 μΜ concentration of the test compound, and the most preferably greater than 90% inhibitory activity at 10 μΜ concentration of the test compound, thereby demonstrating that the compounds of the disclosure are potent inhibitors of the activity of CAIX and CAXII.
